column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Deep dish pizza with butter crust... Yes Please! Lou Malnati's is a Chicago deep dish pizza chain that bakes their pizzas fresh on order. Lines are long and the spot is touristy with ton of people flocking over to grab lunch or dinner. Classic Malnati with cheese
column2: sausage and a butter crust is the way to go. Follow thier recommendations on sizing
column3: the pizza is very heavy and one slice will easily fill you up. It's a bit on the pricey side but worth the cost especially if you're visiting chicago.
